Sentencas: The phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped GdAlO3 samples have been investigated.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The Ba- doped compositions of GdAlO3 were prepared through citrate gel process.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: Analysis of the phases was carried out using X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The morphology of the calcined powders was studied by scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of Gd1-xBaxAlO3-delta (x = 0-0.04) was measured using ac impedance spectroscopy as a function of temperature ranging from 300 to 1000 degrees C under air.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The solid solubility of barium in GdAlO3 was found to be less than 4 mol%.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The undissolved barium precipitated in the form of BaAl2O4 phase.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The barium doped GdAlO3 powders obtained after calcination at 1000 degrees C was found to be porous agglomerate composed of nanocrystalline grains.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate

Sentencas: The total electrical conductivity of Ba-doped GdAlO3 increased with increasing amounts of barium up to 2 mol% doping.
Titulo: Studies on phase evolution and electrical conductivity of barium doped gadolinium aluminate
